snippet.title: Hatred Gameplay Reveal Trailer (new version)
snippet.description:
READ THIS DESCRIPTION:

We've had to redo this trailer, cutting out Unreal Engine trademarks and also New York City asked us to cut out NYPD trademarks (we thought it's a public property, not a registered trademark), so it's censored now in the video.

For more information visit: http://www.hatredgame.com
Our fanpage on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/destructivecreationsteam

Relase date: Q2, 2015
Platform: PC
